title: A Leap into Darkness
description: Now a Wake County, NC Public Libraries Collection selection!Nobody told Jake that dogs don’t talk.Or that he’d have to take on a sorcerer and his dreadful raven.And stop a war between three kingdoms. Perfect for fans of C.S. Lewis’s The Chronicles of Narnia and S.D. Smith's The Green EmberBased on the award-winning screenplay: —Two-time Coverfly Redlist Fantasy Feature Top 20—Semifinalist, StoryPros 14th Annual Awards Screenplay Contest (2021)—Quarterfinalist, Stage 32 - New Voices in Animation Screenwriting Contest (2021)—Quarterfinalist, ScreenCraft Sci-Fi & Fantasy Screenwriting Competition (2021)—Quarterfinalist, Emerging Screenwriters - Genre Screenplay Competition (2020)—Top 100 (Feature or TV Pilot), Table Read My Screenplay Genre Screenplay Competition (2021)—Quarterfinalist, Creative Screenwriting Animation Screenplay Competition (2021)
author: Ray Petrolino
